column1: ms. retha mae bennett| bennett retha mae bennett
column6: 2015 at her residence with her loving family by her side. retha was born in florahome
column8: 1923 to the late oscar geiger and rebecca glover geiger. retha was raised in bradford county where she has been a longtime active member of river of life church of god. she was introduced to the love of her life
column10: by her neighbor and they were married shortly after on may 24
column11: 1941. retha was a devoted wife and loving mother to her four children. she enjoyed her career as a seamstress where she served at big dad manufacturing and later vogue for over 20 years until her retirement in 1984. retha enjoyed sewing
column15: and helping others. she was very caring
column17: and had a special soothing nature with all children and animals. retha also enjoyed attending church
column19: and spending time with her grandchildren and great grandchildren. she was preceded in death by her parents; her husband of 62 years
column27: and ottis geiger; and her sister
column28: clyde scarborough. retha is survived by her loving children
column42: and corby bennett; her 14 great grandchildren
column61: and extended family members. a celebration of rethas life will be held on sunday
column63: 2015 at 3:00 pm at river of life church of god in starke
column64: fl with reverend marian johnson and pastor michael parnell officiating. interment will follow at crosby lake cemetery. the family will receive friends on saturday
column66: 2015 from 5:00 7:00 pm at archie tanner funeral services chapel. arrangements are under the care and direction of archie tanner funeral services
